website_summaries.verdict: An adorable little chair with plenty of character and an appealing price tag. A good everyday option for the toddler years and a bit beyond.
pros: Cute and comfortable with lots of room for toddlers, yet compact enough to fit smaller spaces
Unobtrusive design looks good in any room and alongside most furniture
cons: Fabric stains easily and is difficult to clean
Not as durable as others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair
customer_reviews.text: Great little chair! Our twins are 12 months old and live theirs! They're very lightweight so good for moving around but not so good for little ones climbing in them. They tip back easily. Otherwise they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Not color fast, color comes off material.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the blue denim chair. Loved it at first until I realized the blue that kept getting on my baby was from the chair. Any dampness and the ink comes right off the material.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Perfect size and nice quality. For the reviews saying their chair wasn't sturdy, they must've got a defective one. Ours is definitely sturdy and should last for a long time. We chose the navy gingham print and it is very subtle. Looks almost like a light blue from far away. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily stained upholstery!! Cannot be cleaned.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair and loved it when it came in. It was easily stained, even with just water. It has not withstood normal toddler wear that I expected. I had to find a cover online if I wanted to save the chair and when I did, all the reviews for the cover were great but they all implied how awful the original upholstery was to begin with. I would not recommend this chair since buying the cover is inevitable.
customer_reviews.author: A B Power

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (18mo) loves sitting on anything that is more her size, be it a box or the bottom step of the stairs. She was very happy when she saw this chair just for her! She gets books and comes over on her own and sits in her chair to look at them - super cute! This chair is sturdy and I’m glad I didn’t get the one that rocks. It looks just like the photo and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: One leg considerably shorter than the others
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present. It arrived on time but one leg is considerably shorter than the rest which makes the chair uneven and wobbly. I was gonna return it for a replacement, but that won’t arrive until mid January-February. Looks like we will have to keep the wobbly chair. I am unimpressed with the quality of this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Too lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate it yet on sturdiness, stain resistance or easy to clean.... it is too new, but I sprayed it with Scotch Guard fabric protector that repels liquids and blocks stains... anyway... my 1 yr lil girl loves it... but I think it’s too light..! She slides that thing all over the house, also the lack of weight could be a safety issue if you don’t pay attention and the kids put more weight on the back rest since it could flip... I believe the manufacturer could put heavier “legs” and if the concern is the price increase in shipping then I do recommend sand fillable legs ... I don’t know, just my 2-cents
customer_reviews.author: Wander

customer_reviews.title: As good as it can be for a childs use
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived well in advance for our Christmas and was packaged nicely. 7 months later however it looks pretty dirty. BUT, it is used constantly to eat in while watching movies, climb on, jump on.. you name it - they do it! So, there are a lot of stains on it which do not come out without leaving a large outline of the cleaned area. So if you're getting it to keep as an Heirloom - make sure they don't use it often. Otherwise, let them be kids, enjoy it, mess it up consider it a good purchase for the $
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, study little chair. I would give it 5 stars if 2 issues were corrected. First, it is very light weight, which means it's tippable for a very active, can't sit still on a chair, bouncy toddlers, more weight on the bottom would help. Second, it's really low, like almost sitting on the floor low. Taller legs would be great or at least an option to purchase them as the child gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Orangeblossum

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have had this chair for over a month now and it has held up pretty well. But I do have a few issues. 1. The cushion it had wears down rather quickly. You can fill alot of the wood underneath and theres no way to fluff it back up. 2. It is definitely not stain resistant! My 18 month old has gotten it pretty dirty with food or drinks from his sippy cups leaking on to it. I have attempted to wipe it down but the blue dye leaks all over my towels that I clean it with. I definitely need to buy a cover for the chair now. But its annoying that there is only one option.
customer_reviews.author: Nmartinez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: This chair seemed wonderful at first. My toddler loved having a chair of his own. If felt pretty sturdy and looked great. The problem is, it only has strips of fabric holding the cushion up, so it keeps slipping off and the seat caves in. My husband has attempted to fix it by shoving the cushion back up on the wood that holds it, but It's only a temporary fix, and quite annoying to have to do. If it was made better, and the cushion was fixed onto wooden supports, this chair just might be perfect. As is, I wish I had paid a bit more for something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Sturdy: Dog Tested
customer_reviews.text: Confessions of a dog owner: I purchased 2 of these chairs for my small dogs, placed them near windows and - they are in them all the time! Cute chairs, sturdy. Wish I had bought them earlier!
customer_reviews.author: LadyRoseCTFan

customer_reviews.title: I love this little chair and so does my great grandson
customer_reviews.text: I love this little chair and so does my great grandson. It fits right in with my furniture and it is the perfect size for a fairly tall for a 14 month old. Contrary to some of the reviews that I read it cleaned up just find. The first day that he had it there was a juice accident and the chair looks good after a really good washing with a warm, wet towel.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Clites

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair!
customer_reviews.text: My 18mos old LOVES this chair. Its high quality and came in one piece. He liked the box it came in more than the chair at first, but that was just an added bonus. Super easy to clean. Lightweight for me, but sturdy enough that it won't tip over with him in it. The denim isn't too rough either. It has a softer feel to it!
customer_reviews.author: William F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller dogs. Not so good for bigger ones.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I bought this for my terror (30 lbs). She loves it and it fits her perfectly. She lounges in it all day. The problem is that the big one (55 lbs) gets jealous sometimes and tries to sit his big ol' butt in it. He doesn't quite fit, but he pretends he does. I have to shoo him out because I'm not sure the chair can take his weight very well. It's still holding up despite his several attempts to shove his body into the small seating space, though. I definitely recommend this for people like me who are *that* kind of pet owner, though.
customer_reviews.author: My Terrier is a Terror

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chair at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fantastic. It is really well made at such an affordable price point, and my 15 month old loves it. The only problem I have (and this is no fault of the chair) is that he likes to climb up and sit on the top of the chair, or try to tip it. He'll probably end up bumping his head at some point, but that would happen if an adult tried to sit on top of a full sized chair too so what can I expect? Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rmc2012

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be well made, we have owned it for 7 months, and it is used on a daily basis. My daughter is 19 months old and 29 pounds. She isn't much of a climber, but if not up against a wall in would probably tipped if climbed on. My only complaint is that it is impossible to clean. I wish I would have put some staingaurd on it, or a cover. Now it is stained because it is for a toddler and looks kinda gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chair is very nice and what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this chair for Christmas for my 2 year old daughter. Chair is very nice and what I was looking for. Small enough for her, but looks like it will give her some years of use. Only issue I had was that I ordered the brown, which appears to be a brown color on the picture listed, but looks more black in real life. From afar it looks like a black and white checkered chair, so if that’s not what you are hoping for, don’t get the brown. That said, chair is still very nice and the color is not worth me returning as it’s not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my nephews room!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old nephew who loves to sit and look at books. This little arm chair is now his favorite peice of furniture. It is well built light weight and is cute and matches other pieces in the home. You would think it was custom made, just looking at it. I also love that it is lite weight and we take it from his bedroom to the living room with ease. I am incredible blown away by the price because a chair like this I would expect to be much more expensive! It made an incredible gift. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jess the Mess

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but stains easy.
customer_reviews.text: Idk how this fabric was picked out for a toddlers chair, but ok. It stains like crazy. And you will go crazy trying to keep it clean. And when your kid does get something on it. The stains have a brown ring around it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for great price
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this chair for my son and we love it. The price point and reviews were a factor in getting in. I really didn't see the need to spend a ton of money on a chair that a rough toddler would be using. My son loves to sit and climb on the chair and it's held up so far. We are going to get some stain guard for it, not because there is a stain but we wanted to keep it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Cute but can't clean and stains easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our daughter and it was the perfect size for her. Low to the ground, sturdy, and the gingham was super cute. BUT, it stains SO EASILY. Not even just food and juice - if it gets wet, it'll leave a water stain and you can't remove them. I would try and clean it and the stain would just get bigger. Their really is no way to clean this which is not good since it's made for little kids. They do offer a cover but they are just in solid colors and not fun designs. Advise to go with a different chair with a removeable cover.
customer_reviews.author: Patizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the little ones, makes them feel like an adult!
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loves her little chair! The material and build quality are top notch just like a regular sofa chair would offer. It need to stand up to the abuse of a small child and this serves that purpose wonderfully. Price is not too exorbitant, although I would not recommend it for children much past the age of three as they will likely be too big physically to make practical use of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: DiddyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that this thing smelled horrible for the first few days. I honestly couldn't be within 15 feet of the thing because the smell was so strong. Our son immediately sat on the chair but took a few tries to get off successfully (14 months old). He now pushes it all over the house to climb up on things which is an unfortunate development..
customer_reviews.author: Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so cute and fun we were excited to get it however it only ended up lasting maybe eight months if we were lucky it stains even with water, the material on it fades really quick and doesn’t look nice any longer and it ripped in the couch just from my two-year-old sitting on it. Definitely not worth paying the $50 for but if you do get the protection plan
customer_reviews.author: IllustratingYou

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Amazing Chair!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after getting one of those soft kids' chairs. The soft kids chair was terrible. It got stained up quickly. My daughter would lean back too far and it would fall over. It only lasted a few months. I bought this chair and was super happy with how sturdy it was. Great quality. I think she'll be able to use it for a long time. (She's four now.)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Its lighter weight and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair. Its lighter weight and easy to move, it can however fall backwards with enough weight but this is not a concern when supervising. Only thing I found is that when I wiped the chair with a wet paper towel (no cleaner just water) the paper towel was very blue from the dye. It has not gotten into any clothing but it definitely could if the chair is wet for any reason. Quick shipping, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: and the hard wooden frame is painful for my children to sit on
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for kid-sized chairs for my playroom. I purchased 2 of these, and within 2 months they are already starting to fall apart. The cushion is sinking in, and the hard wooden frame is painful for my children to sit on. They have started putting the throw pillows from the couch in there so they can still sit in them. I spent over $60 on each chair, and I'm sorely disappointed. I would NOT recommend these chairs, and I wish I would have spent a bit more to have quality. I feel if a company is making children's sized furniture, they should be able to stand up to more than 1 month of children's use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Love this Chair
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these for my grand daughter and she loves it! I see her using it up till about 5...she is 14 months now. It's very easy for her to get in and out of. The only thing i don't like is that the feet slide on the floor so you have to back it up against the wall. I'm going to maybe get non slide feet for the legs.
customer_reviews.author: DENNISDENISE

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do we post reviews, but it's totally called for this time! The kids love them and would live in them if they didn't have to sleep. The cats also love them and take them over while the kids sleep. I was skeptical about how well they would clean up, but after an exorcism style cat vomit extravaganza I'm not worried. I dumped it in the tub and just after rinsing you couldn't tell the episode had happened. (Don't worry, it got scrubbed and soaped up like crazy!) I know where I'm getting more chairs when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great kids sofa with some inconsistencies.
customer_reviews.text: Great sofa. We’ve had the denim version for a while now and bought another for our daughter. The second sofa I received had some inconsistencies with the denim version. The sofa back is noticeably more straight then the denim version. Aside from that the sofa is great and at this price point you really can’t complain much.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Child has to learn to sit and not stand up - will tip over
customer_reviews.text: Our 17 months old grandson really likes his own special chair. Unfortunately, sometimes he likes to stand up in it and has come close to tipping it and falling on his face. Whenever he insists on standing up in it, Grandma has to put it away for a little while. It really is a very cute chair, and I hope he learns to sit in it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair for a Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for my 6 yr old and he loves it. He sit in his chair and watches TV and/or plays on his tablet. This chair is just as it appears online, and made with a quality denim cover, very comfortable and has chair leg caps that make it easy for him to move around without scratching up our hardwood floors. A good purchase that I'm happy with and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: GC Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair but wears down fast
customer_reviews.text: Initially we loved this chair. We got it for our son for Christmas. But he has not had it even a year and in 7 months it is fraying and the material is ripping. He doesn't jump or stand on this. He just sits but somehow the fabric on the arms and the seat are just thinning out and falling apart and it's sad to look at now. The price was right we just thought we'd get more time out of it before having to invest in a new one.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Wow... cleaning is difficult.
customer_reviews.text: Wow... cleaning is difficult. I would not buy this again.... actually, I'd return it if I could but my toddler enjoys sitting in it.... I attempted to spot clean it and the coloring came off onto the towel... Made me nervous as to my toddler touching it with wet fingers and putting those fingers back in her mouth. 2 stars because my toddler really does enjoy sitting in it
customer_reviews.author: Ami O.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old! She gets to have her own comfy chair. Arrived early (eventho with Covid slowing everything down) and it’s not too heavy. It got stained fast because we chose a lighter colored fabric which can be spot cleaned. My toddler had jumped on and gotten roughed up with the chair and it’s still holding up pretty good. I’m giving it 5 stars because it’s cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday L

customer_reviews.title: Eh... depends on how rough your kid is
customer_reviews.text: Well... seemed okay at first. I didn't give it one star because I know my daughter can be rough on furniture, but it seems pretty cheap and not well built. Had it for a few weeks before the back started peeling off, and the foam seat seemed to have sunk under the frame that holds it. Not sure if they use cardboard to keep the foam padding in place but it seemed to be pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Denim one bleeds and transfers
customer_reviews.text: I opted for the denim chair and while the chair itself is great, the color bleeds and transfers onto clothes it rubbed against it. I’d love to be able to remove the cover and wash it to minimize the color transfer. Chair structure is sturdy and comfortable (firm yet cushiony). My three year old loves it to read books and play games on her iPad.
customer_reviews.author: liz7435

customer_reviews.title: Not the best chair out there
customer_reviews.text: We have had the chair for about 18 months and it is already falling apart. The fabric is too thin and not durable enough on the edge where their legs rub and it is completely wearing thin. I am very disappointed in it as my son has a Lighting McQueen one from Toys R Us that has stood up a lot of abuse and even 5 years later is still going strong. Also do NOT order a light colored one because it shows everything and looks gross pretty quickly, unlike a darker one where it hides the grossness of toddlers easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable kids chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair for my daughter's first birthday. When we first opened the box my husbanded noticed the seat makes a noise when putting weight in the center of the seat. After a few weeks of use the noise is still barely noticeable but doesn't bother me. I did read reviews about the chair tipping if child puts weight on the back so we always use it pushed against the couch. My daughter loves it and it has held up nicely so far. Great chair for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the denim blue chair and color is as expected. I like that it fits in with the rest of the house and my kid can grow into it a bit. I do wish the wooden feet had something on them to prevent sliding, but I can fix that myself. Already has a couple stains that show up on the dark material, but I guess that's expected since its for kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his chair. And, I love that I didn't pay the high price tag for a trendy chair from an upscale store for my toddler to smash cheddar bunny crumbs into. Color is like a dark denim and the chair looks like a miniature adult chair, not like some of the ugly ones you see in the discount stores (well, ugly to me...). It sort of matches the decor that we have going or at least doesn't clash with everything. My son is super happy to sit in his chair with his favorite blanket and watch Sesame Street while mommy is getting ready for work in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Alison H

customer_reviews.title: It's All His!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for my 1 year old grandson, he loved this chair because it was just for him. I was oversized, but not too big and very well made. He lasted a brutal beating dealt by an 1 year old that consisted of jumping and flipping. You will have to do a lot of spot cleaning, so have an upholstery cleaner handy. You do have to be careful with your little one on this chair, because they tend to want to sit on the back of the chair and stand up on it, which may lead to the chair falling backwards. I would definitely recommend this kids chair.
customer_reviews.author: LaShauna

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable kid chair.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves her little chair. It’s comfortable for her & just her size, she’s big for a 3y/o & can easily fit a doll in the chair by her. It cleans easily with a wet cloth & stain remover & the fabric has held up well after a year+ of everyday use. The fabric looks nice in my living room as opposed to the tacky kid chairs with cartoons all over them that tend to look a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Shalyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is just so completely adorable! It seems very well made and worth way more than the $45 price tag! We got this for our son’s first birthday gift and he absolutely loves it. It’s the perfect size for him now and I know he will continue to use it for years to come. It’s lightweight enough to pick up and take to different spot or different room but also sturdy enough to not flip over. Our son has gotten all the way standing on it once and it’s four feet never left the ground. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect chair for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved having his own chair that is his height. He drags it over to watch his shows and it has held up to all his climbing and jumping. Been a great buy for our household. Hes gotten several food stains on it but we haven't tried anything beyond wiping to clean them out. Overall I'd recommend this chair to anyone with a small child.
customer_reviews.author: James Nye

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tip over
customer_reviews.text: The anywhere chair by pottery barn and other chairs like it (i.e. beanbag chairs and soft chairs) tip over easily and need to rest against couches or walls. This one can stand up on its own unless the kid is standing on the back rest. Since kids do things like that all the time, I still have its back against something sturdy - but this particular baby chair is very durable, rugged, and looks wonderful, has great springiness but is still firm enough to support a kid who is monkeying around on it, and my baby loves to pull up on it and climb into and out of it all day long. It's the safest one I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Pooky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect! Our daughter loves to sit and climb in it. I am also a fan that it isn't an obnoxious print or color like some kids furniture. It fits our living room decor perfectly and our daughter feels like a big girl having her own chair. Well made, sturdy and will last a long time. Our daughter is 14 months, 32" tall and 22lbs and this chair will easily work for a couple more years. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Shea

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (8 months) loves this chair. It's overstuffed and perfect for him. He sat in the chair for over a hour happy - didn't say a word. It's big enough he can lay down, sit sideways, and wiggle around. The Denim material is actually very cute. I thought it looked tacky in pictures but I actually love it. Great Buy ++++
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not as plush as I would have hoped but a cute product and our kid is using it. What can you expect for under 50 bucks? I don't expect this the last for the long term but rather in all likelihood a few months and then it hits the trash pail. Nice temporary solution to make the kid feel good.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Buddy - Bud Fleisher

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this chair
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 15 month old who LOVES to sit in adult chairs so we always had to sit next to her and make sure she wouldn't fall out. The minute I got this chair, it's all she sits in! I love that it looks "nice" and like real furniture, so we have it in the living room. She can be rough with it (bouncing on it, climbing over the top) and it has held up nicely. Very easy to wipe off. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to keep at my house for my granddaughter. It arrived, out of the box, with loose strings, and a visible gap in the fabric in the front of the chair. My granddaughter loves it, and don't intend to return it but it shouldn't come with such issues when it is new.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: KEET Roundy Kid's Chair Denim, Blue
customer_reviews.text: It is well built, nice looking and fairly easy to clean. Only dislike is the seat cushion. Material used in cushion, apparently foam rubber, is deforming though no child more the 35 pounds has used, also when tot sits the cushion squeaks. Otherwise a fare chair at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent H.

customer_reviews.title: THIS ONES THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is like a real piece of furniture. It is perfect for ages 1+ to 5yrs old. It is made very well and will last a long time. It is not like the cheap ones you see in the stores. It’s sturdy, durable and stain resistant. I highly recommend this chair. My granddaughters absolutely love it. And it is adorable. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Snowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seat for, and loved by my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about this being the right height for my daughter to easily get on and off, and it is perfect. She's about average height for a 1.5yr old. She LOVES this thing so much, I can't believe I ever hesitated over getting it. It has held up well to her climbing all over it for the last few months. I should have scotch guarded it as soon as it arrived, but was too impatient. The pattern does help conceal small stains though. It's not very heavy, but still seems decently-made for kids' furniture. Of all the similar kids' arm chairs I considered, I'm glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Esserlieu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review things. But we've had the chair less than 3 months and the cushion is already flat and half of it slipped under the wood frame. My daughter won't go near it anymore. She never jumped on it or did anything other than sit down on it. She's 2. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Gilda Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: cute toddler chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chairfor my daughter a few years ago. The item came as described and the color was true to what was pictured. My daughter loved to sit in it. The only problem I had with the chair was that it wasn't very stable or sturdy. As with all kids, they love to climb things. This chair would tilt or fall back every time she wanted to stand or lean on the back of the chair. I had to prop the chair behind a wall or something sturdy to avoid the chair falling back.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Stains easily but Love the chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It is adorable. However it’s stains easily and doesn’t clean well. My son sat in it with his water and leaked some water on it and it left a stain. I attempted to clean it up with fabric cleaner and it did not come clean, just ended up looking worse. I would recommend buying the cover at the same time. Regardless we love the chair and my son relaxes in it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: we decided on this one and we couldn't be happier. My husband and I have found her multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: Since my 17 month daughter was turning everything into a chair (soccer ball, stepping stool, foam roller, shipping boxes, file container, etc) I decided that she needed a chair of her own. After research and reviews, we decided on this one and we couldn't be happier. My husband and I have found her multiple times, with a book, in her chair. It makes me happy to see her using it for its intended purpose--a space of her own to read. And due to its size, there is room to grow into it! (As other reviews have stated, the cushioning in the back is not superb, but it is enough!)
customer_reviews.author: Pascha Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I chose this chair - it's perfect! I have been debating getting the Pottery Barn chair for quite a while now but with another baby on the way, figured I'd look to see if I could find a cheaper chair for my toddler. Came across this one and we LOVE it! I would even buy this chair if it was double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second chair that I’ve bought as I bought one in a different color for my daughter and my kids absolutely love them! So sturdy and great as my kids climb all over them and love to feel like big kids sitting in them and watch tv with us!
customer_reviews.author: Tarrah Casteel

customer_reviews.title: ... this for our 1-year-old grandson after he tried and loved the same chair at his 4-year-old cousin's house
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 1-year-old grandson after he tried and loved the same chair at his 4-year-old cousin's house. It is decent quality and its design prevents it from easily tipping backward, which, for toddlers who like to climb and bounce, makes it a well-thought-out product. This little chair sits solid whether he's sitting or standing on it. He loves this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Til U Drop

customer_reviews.title: Denim color bleeds!
customer_reviews.text: It looks relatively comfortable and it’s a good size/shape but that’s about where the positives end for me. The denim color bleeds onto everything! Can’t dress my daughter in any light clothes if she wants to sit in the chair. It tips easy. And it wobbles. Drives me absolutely crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Nmr1989

customer_reviews.title: nice and light maybe two light because if child stands ...
customer_reviews.text: nice and light maybe two light because if child stands on it (which a child will do) and leans back it tips over quickly. Easily moved around by a almost 2 year old so she can put where she would like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Bitts

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!! My grandson is going to love this well made, durable chair for years to come! He is 15 months old and big for his age. From the looks of it he should be able to use this chair for a few years. The denim material is perfect for scrubbing out whatever stains he can muster up. Now I'm thinking about getting. The matching couch....so cute
customer_reviews.author: B. Olken

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable kids chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my oldest grandson. He out-grew it and passed it down to his little brother. It's been stood on, and every way 2 boys can think of to torture it, has been done. It's 5 years old now and still going strong. Although it doesn't look like new, it doesn't look too bad to use in the main living room. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: Seat cushion becomes unlevel after use...
customer_reviews.text: The chair was not well constructed in the cushion. It sank toward the back and now has a lopsided shape. The chair exterior seems to be OK at this time. Stable, flat and level on the floor. Would question construction of the seat cushion part.....
customer_reviews.author: pnash

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and supportive
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this chair. Got it for her at 9 months old. We sat her in it supervised and she's got to it ever since! We never worry about it's sturdiness after watching her climb into it, a good, solid chair. Now almost 2 yrs old, she still has plenty of wiggle room to use it another 2 years, I'd say. We haven't seen too many stains yet, but it's covered cotton... I'm not worried about cleaning it when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacq Civitarese

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm missing it but they cover doesn't come off making cleaning harder then heck. The seat area for the butt is completely flat after just a few months (maybe 2) my son is 2 and a half and weighs maybe 50 pounds. I was really expecting better quality for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Came stained
customer_reviews.text: Came stained... I realize its a child's chair and may get stained in the future, but i still don't want to start out with one, especially when shelling out nearly $50 Will reach out to seller to see what can done..
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cute, good price!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is adorable and the perfect size. We actually got it for my dog because he kept jumping in anytime he was at someone's house who had one. Will definitely be getting one for my daughter in a few months when she is old enough. It's also sturdy - I have propped myself in it and it didn't break, and I have broken a chair like this before just goofing around.
customer_reviews.author: CindyS

customer_reviews.title: Gets dirty but is great.
customer_reviews.text: Gets dirty really fast but we expected that from the other reviews. My 1 year old loves her little chair so much. She was using the car seat and the stroller to sit in and chill, so we looked for a little chair for her. It’s perfect. We have had it for months now and she flips it over and throws it around and it’s still in perfect condition besides dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy chair for my 1 & can3 year olds
customer_reviews.text: So here's the thing - this chair is awesome. I got it for my 1.5 year old - it's his chair, and he loves it. It's perfect size. He can sit on the edge and his feet touch the floor, or he can sit against the back and his legs are almost totally supported. I don't allow the kids the rough house with it much, because of the other reviews about workmanship. We've had it a few months, and it is so admired by his 3 year old brother, that I'm getting him his own too ( now that it's under fifty bucks)
customer_reviews.author: L Brighten

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, almost too lightweight but seems durable enough
customer_reviews.text: We do love this little chair, although it is lightweight it might be a little TOO lightweight. My 15 month easily moves it around and turns it over. Slides around easy. The back of the chair seems like it might rip easily if pressure is applied since there’s no real study back. All over my child loves it so it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: My family loves this chair.
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons favorite chair. It's light enough for him to move around the room, but heavy enough that if he chooses to stand on it (against my wishes), it will not tip over. Now his baby sister loves to sit on it and we may have to purchase another one. We also have a small dog who likes to curl up in this chair at night after we all go to bed, I just wish they sold slip covers for it as things tend to be dropped down the sides and not recoverable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennfer D. Siik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean, super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It actually has a wood frame around the back and bottom so it’s very sturdy. It has wooden feet which gives it that realistic appeal. Fabric is nice and easy to clean! My son (two years old) loves it and sits in it every day! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hepburn & Chelsea Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, as expected
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair for our 2 year old, and we've been pleased with it. Our son seems to enjoy it and after two months it's still going strong. The construction seems sturdy enough for a child, and it is very light. My only afterthought was that a cover (or removeable cover, would be useful. It stains easily (who would ever have thought a child would spill food and drink?), but it's not a manufacturer issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Kids chair
customer_reviews.text: I loved the stylish look of this kid’s chair. I chose this over others because of the price and size. It’s compact enough not to be in the way too much but roomy enough that my two year old will be able to use it for a while still. The color is neutral enough to go with various decor styles and seems like it will hold up well with 3 little boys.( Only time will really tell.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my one year olds birthday. She loves her own seat in the living room go sit and read or play. I have seen several others that are prone to tip over when the child leans back. Definitely not the case for this chair. I have thought about investing in a cover or blanket to keep material in good shape, but I haven’t needed it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: The Laven Family

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This chair is adorable and exceeded my expectations. We actually had to purchase this for my daughter because my son was gifted the blue denim one and they were fighting over it like crazy. My son is 3 and 36" tall and 30 lbs, and he fits great in it still. My daughter is 16 months and loves it. They're cute, stylish and the quality is nice. The padding on the chair is very nice and hasn't shown any wear yet despite what some other reviewers have said. Each of my children have stood on these and have yet to tip them over, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high quality, classy
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I covered my two chairs with 2 coats of Scotch Guard before setting them out for my 2 y.o. and 3 y.o. I don't like the main part of my home to look too babyish so the little chairs give the kids their own seats without cheapening the look...save that for the playroom. The chairs have taken a beating, been used several times a day, climbed all over, spilled sippy cups and sticky fingers clean right off, even my two small dogs steal a seat now and then. You can't beat the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good little chair
customer_reviews.text: My child loves his chair. Hes 23m and fits great. Not to big or to small and well grow with it for a while. Chair is a nice soild chair yet easy to lift and move anywhere for you parents. The only thing that has been concerning is that when i wipe down the chair to clean it alot of blue ink rubs off onto the wipes or rags. So far does not stain any clothes from sitting on it though so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Marcroft

customer_reviews.title: Great kid chair
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs; this is the second one we have purchases. We got this so each kid had their own chair, now they just horde them and try to keep both for themselves. They are a good weight and don't fall over when fallen into and the padding is nice and soft over the whole chair.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my toddler. She loves to sit on it and watch her cartoons. I put a small pillow since she can't reach the back yet, haha. I chose this particular dark color so that milk/juice stains won't be noticeable. :0)
customer_reviews.author: graduaterebeca

customer_reviews.title: WHY THE BAD SMELL?
customer_reviews.text: Received this chair for my toddler and it seems pretty cool to have. Took it out of the plastic and there is smell like vomit on the chair. Two stars because it seemed comfortable and sturdier for him to sit in. Yet, I’m not sure what was sprayed on it or the fabric but the smell is terrible. We have tried to air it out for over two weeks and it is still there. We are looking to return it and unsure of purchasing another one due to other reviews of bad smells. Yet we would like one, obviously in great condition and no smells.
customer_reviews.author: Quenton E. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean, material came apart, hard frame can be felt through cushion
customer_reviews.text: -I purchased the denim color. I wiped a spot gently with a damp paper towel and the color rubbed off. I struggle to clean this without damaging the material. -The foam does not provide a sufficient cushion. The hard frame may be felt under the armrests and along the edges. It's an unwelcome feeling for toddlers who fall against it. -After a year of light use by a small one-year-old, the fabric has burst from the seams, exposing the foam underneath. I will be trashing it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for a senior cat who has difficulty getting up on normally sized furniture. Surprise! She can climb aboard but there's so much padding in the arms she can't lie down on the seat. I'm going to try to surgically remove some of the padding so she can use it. If I fail I'll be donating it to someone with a skinny child.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my 20 month old son and he loves it! It is well built, sturdy and so comfortable. Me and my husband sit on it often as well and it has held up really well. The downside of it is that cleaning is a bit difficult since the cover is not removable, but the chair is really good quality. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have looked at a number of kids chairs and were blown away by the prices. $80+ for chairs that a toddler would destroy. I found this one an Amazon and decided to give it a go. I got this chair for my 17 month old son and he loves it. It's big enough that he can cuddle up into the chair and still have space to spare. My only complaint on this chair, the one I received does not sit flat on the floor; it seems that the feet are not level.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fiorenza

customer_reviews.title: Could've been made a bit heavier
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this thing 3.5 stars but can't. Cuz that's really how I feel about it, I love it but I hate it. My toddler loves pushing and throwing it around and I have a petite little one, this means that the chair is extremely light weight and not sturdy at all. I love that my toddler loves it but I hate that it's so easy for her to topple it over. If you're getting it for your toddler just know that it's not going to stay in one place, they're going to drag it all over cuz they can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little chair way below cost of similar ones. It’s just too light weight. Any toddler leaning back will topple. If you have a space to prop against a wall, super, then it’s a great little chair.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Furniture-quality toddler chair.
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to wear or ease of cleaning yet but my 8 month old granddaughter loves this chair! Very sturdy furniture-quality. Deming blue color is great; goes well with adult furniture. She should be able to use this for years. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great little chair for our toddler, it does stain pretty easily so we decided to scotch guard it. Pretty easy to wipe down after that. It’s sturdy enough for a toddler, but definitely not for the weight of adults or older children. Overall we are very happy with this chair, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney F

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE their little couch. It is made very well, they are constantly climbing all over it and it's held up. It is low enough to the ground that a child learning how to climb up onto it will not fall far if they do fall and it is large enough that a 2-4 year old could comfortable sit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Florio

customer_reviews.title: Really cute chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It’s really cute and the perfect size for my 1 year old to grow into. The only issue I’ve had has been when trying to spot the clean the chair. A lot of color came off when wiped with warm water. The color loss isn’t noticeable on the chair itself but it makes me worry it will be noticeable eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous chair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son the navy chair about five years ago. He still uses it all the time and it's in great condition (except for some staining). I just bought my daughter the blue gingham chair because I am so impressed with how long the other chair has lasted. This is a great deal for the money and both my six-year-old and one-year-old love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Its been at least two months and still holding up fine. Child is a very active 18-month-old and but loves her chair. Only thing better is if they could have added a cup holder. Easy for her to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Amy

customer_reviews.title: Tips easy
customer_reviews.text: wobbly, , one leg shorter, come on now. also very tippy, monitor child else they will fall if moving back. Material at seam torn. Over all not happy....might be easy to clean? water spilled a few drops and color came off!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: This is truly a great chair! My one year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great chair! My one year old loves it. He sits in it to "read" books, eat snacks, or watch a few cartoons. The upholstery isn't the greatest with all the weird tuck and folds but it does the job. Downside is that it is very light, light enough that my one year old can slide it all over the house, which means it knocks over very easily too. I solved that problem but placing it so that the back of the chair is against a wall. I would highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Honesty

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that the base isn't very heavy so it tips over very easily if your little one decides to kneel on the ...
customer_reviews.text: A cute, perfectly sized toddler chair. My only complaint is that the base isn't very heavy so it tips over very easily if your little one decides to kneel on the seat and lean against the back too much. I find myself constantly moving it so that it's backed up against something. As well, not having a heavy base allows it to slide all over the floor, which can naturally be quite annoying to my husband and I, as well as our two year old daughter. Overall though, it's cuter than any other chair I've seen and my daughter finds it quite comfortable, so it's still well worth the purchase and four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keet Roundy Kid's Chair Gingham, Navy
product_meta.description:
Color:NavyNOTE: This is an assorted product; color and print advertised are subjected to vary.
The Roundy chair was designed to enhance the beauty of any room. It is also comfortable and durable; it has a strong wood frame, covered with high density foam to maximize comfort. The Chair is handmade just like an adult piece of furniture with wooden legs. The Beautiful Gingham fabric is easy to coordinate with most room décor. Add a Roundy Chair to any room to create a special place for reading, watching TV or just Relaxing. Your kids will love it.
feature_bullets: Beautiful Gingham fabric easy to coordinate
Age range : for children ages 2 to 5. Strong Wooden Frame, for durability
High Density foam, for added comfort
Wooden Legs, for a real furniture look;Measures 24W x 18D x 17H inches.
Available in assorted colors, Weekly vacuuming is recommended to reduce soil buildup. Use light dishwashing soap and warm water for spot cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,451 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
